Description

Job Description: We are looking for an experienced Import/Export E-commerce Specialist to manage and streamline our international shipping and e-commerce operations. The ideal candidate will be fluent in Mandarin and have a strong background in import/export logistics, e-commerce platforms, and customer service.

Key Responsibilities

  • Oversee and manage the import and export processes, ensuring compliance with international trade regulations.
  • Coordinate with suppliers, freight forwarders, and customs brokers to ensure timely and cost-effective shipping.
  • Manage e-commerce platforms, including listing products, updating inventory, and processing orders.
  • Communicate with international clients and partners in Mandarin to ensure smooth transactions and resolve any issues.
  • Monitor and analyze shipping costs, delivery times, and other key metrics to optimize operations.
  • Handle documentation for import/export activities, including invoices, packing lists, and shipping labels.
  • Assist with customer service inquiries related to international orders, providing excellent support and resolving issues promptly.
  • Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and implement strategies to increase international sales.
  • Maintain accurate records of all transactions and prepare reports as needed.

Qualifications

  • Fluency in Mandarin and English is required.
  • Bachelor’s degree in Business, International Trade, Supply Chain Management, or a related field.
  • Minimum of 3 years of experience in import/export logistics, preferably within an e-commerce environment.
  • Strong understanding of international shipping regulations and customs procedures.
  • Proficient in using e-commerce platforms (e.g., Shopify, Amazon) and ERP systems.
  • Excellent organizational and time management skills.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work onsite in Brea, CA, four days a week.

Benefits

  • Competitive salary
  • Health, dental, and vision insurance
  • Paid time off and holidays
  • Opportunities for professional growth and development

Requirements

  • Proven experience in a Project Manager role or similar
  • Proficient in using Atlassian Jira for project management
  • Comprehensive knowledge of CRM (Customer Relationship Management) systems
  • Familiarity with database management and EO/IR systems
  • Understanding of IBM systems and About Time software
  • Experience in managing budget processes effectively
  • Background in construction industry would be beneficial
  • Strong customer service skills
  • Ability to deliver projects on time, ensuring all deliverables are met
  • Excellent coordination skills, particularly in logistics.
